recentLinks.title: Pathfinder
recentLinks.alt: Simple illustration of a few nodes connected by lines
recentLinks.description: From its creator: "[A] tool for exploring the space between two concepts". Fascinating.

recentLinks.title: A Friendly Introduction to SVG
recentLinks.alt: Hero image of a friendly introduction to SVG
recentLinks.description: I can't think of a better description other than what the title already conveys.

currentlyReading.title: Marc Davis in His Own Words
currentlyReading.author: Pete Docter & Christopher Merritt
currentlyReading.alt: Book cover of Marc Davis in His Own Words
currentlyReading.review: My favorite rides at the Disney theme parks are experiences designed by one of Disney's Nine Old Men, Marc Davis; Haunted Mansion & Pirates of the Caribbean. In this two-volume coffee book collection, Marc's designs and philosophy are on display.
